name: 2d Platformer "Spaceship Adventure"
description:
Hello,

This is a course assignment game on coursera.org. Please enjoy and write a review or comment.

Controls:

  • A, D - move left and right
  • Space - jump and double jump in the air
  • Mouse - move camera to look around

Changes in the game:

  • added 8 levels
  • wrote a script for a moving platform activated by a trigger
  • wrote a script and added a health bar for some enemies
  • wrote a script that restart enemy position when player dies
  • update the script for moving enemy, when the enemy hit the player he will move back
  • added moving objects (box, ball)
  • added "game is finished" screen
  • changed background music

Created by Andrey Meshkotov
